notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization of the original idea, writing the original draft, and final editing of the manuscript, B.C.F. and C.d.S.M.B.F.; molecular docking study and writing, N.S.M.I.; conceptualization, methodology, review and editing, and supervision, D.P.d.S. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
